subject: Re: [junit] Re: Unit testing Contexts
msgSnippet: On 8/14/06, Shinobu Kawai  wrote: *snip* ... *snip* ... I was one of the technical reviewers for the book and I think it rocks; J.B.
messageBody:
On 8/14/06, Shinobu Kawai <shinobu.kawai@...> wrote:
*snip*
> That's a very good book. I'm thinking of taking it to work today.
*snip*
> ## And I sure hope he's heard of it, too. :)

I was one of the technical reviewers for the book and I think it
rocks; J.B. rocks as well. Also, while I *know* he's heard of it, I
suspect that some days he wishes he hadn't! (Do you know how much work
is involved in creating anything of that magnitude?)

Simon
